540000.name: Princess Maker 2 Refine - Original Soundtrack (Complete Edition)
540000.description:
Princess Maker 2 Original Soundtrack是从
PC-98, DOS, FM TOWNS, Refine 至始到目前为止所发行版本音源之集大成的完整版。

下载完成后请打开Princess Maker 2Refine文件夹，即可找到MP3文件。
...\Steam\steamapps\common\Princess Maker 2 Refine\Soundtrack

Disk 1 : PC-98
Disk 2 : DOS
Disk 3 : FM TOWNS
Disk 4 : Refine

曲目列表
01 Profile Creation
02 Opening #1
03 Opening #2
04 Main Scene - Spring
05 Main Scene - Summer
06 Main Scene - Autumn
07 Main Scene -Winter
08 Horrifying Shock
09 Sickness
10 Shall we go to Castle
